text: The pricing tiers are super confusing. I thought I was upgrading but got charged more without added value.
Great UI overall, but onboarding took me hours — the setup guide wasn’t clear enough.
We really need integrations with HubSpot and Salesforce. Without them, the tool doesn’t fit into our workflow.
Customer support was fantastic — super quick and helpful!
The reporting is very limited. I couldn’t export the analytics I needed for my team.
